page.title: 11GALA DAYS
page.content: The inhabitants of the villages of Breich, Addiewell and Stoneyburn look forward to their Gala Day every summer.Gala Days are common amongst allthe communities in West Lothian and they all take much the same kind of format. The Gala Days of Addiewell and Stoneyburn both fall on{the second {Saturday in June.}The week before is {}packed with events for all ages e.g football,netball,high jump,pillow fighting,"Its A Knockout",dances,bingo etc. The Gala Day itself begins with a {parade}through the village.This is led by several bands and includes decorated floats and people in Fancy Dress as well as the villagers. Stoneyburn's Gala Day,unlike Addiewell's,also include a Gala Queen and her attendants.
